function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Claims of COVID-19 being a manufactured virus","Impact":"Undermines public trust in healthcare authorities, leading to misinformation and conspiracy theories","Mitigation":"Public education on virus origins and transparent communication from health authorities","Technologies":"None specified","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities and science communicators"},{"Description":"Misinformation about the nature of COVID-19","Impact":"Confusion and uncertainty about the origins of the virus, leading to mistrust of scientific research","Mitigation":"Promotion of accurate and evidence-based information on the origins of COVID-19","Technologies":"Social media monitoring and fact-checking tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Science communicators and fact-checking organizations"},{"Description":"Linking COVID-19 to natural catastrophic events","Impact":"Fear-mongering and misrepresentation of virus origins, leading to public anxiety and distrust of scientific explanations","Mitigation":"Dissemination of accurate scientific information on virus origins and evolution","Technologies":"Data visualization and public communication platforms","People":"General public","Owner":"Science communicators and public health authorities"}]}
